sentences.sContent: They feel strongly that their religion is incompatible with the political system.
sentences.sCn: 他们强烈地感到他们的宗教信仰与政治体制格格不入。

synos.tran: [数]不相容的；矛盾的；不能同时成立的

remMethod.val: in(不) + compatible(和谐共存的) → 无法和谐共存的， 不相容的

trans.tranCn: 性质相反的, 矛盾的, 不调和的
trans.tranOther: If one thing or person is incompatible with another, they are very different in important ways, and do not suit each other or agree with each other
